name: Kobo Forest Sweets
description:
Kobo Forest Sweets

Start playing Kobo Forest Sweets today - an amazing puzzle game loved by millions of players around the world.

Swap and match Forest Fruits in this great puzzle game to advance to the next level and feel great satisfaction! Solve puzzles with quick thinking and smart moves and your actions will be rewarded!

Plan your moves by matching 3 or more Forest Fruits in a row, use boosters wisely to overcome all obstacles!

Kobo Forest Sweets Features:

A GAME THAT ALLOWS YOU TO DO MORE

Hundreds of the best levels and puzzles in the amazing Kobo Forest. Additionally, especially for you, we are adding new, fascinating levels!

MANY WAYS TO WIN PRIZES

Check back daily and spin the Daily Booster Wheel for free rewards. Take part in limited-time challenges to earn boosters to help you level up!

Take part in this epic saga alone or play with your friends to see who can get the highest score!

Kobo Forest Sweets is free to play, but in-game optional items require payment. You can disable the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device's settings.

By downloading this game, you are agreeing to our terms of service, which can be found at https://ububoogames.com/privacy-policy

Have fun playing Kobo Forest Sweets, a match 3 puzzle game!
